title: What should I write for my common app? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question is to general and vague. No one here knows you at all, certainly not better than yourself. You need to make some blocks of time to work on this. essays are not written by polling people or even just thinking about it. You need to sit down with a variety of prompts and brain storm some. Think of some anecdotes that reminds you of the prompts. Then just start writing something. This is not a finished product, you are just generating ideas. Sometimes the writing will lead to idea generation. Later you try to shape the writing into something that fits 650 word essay. Rewrite and edit.
